alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 10 at 3:51AM MST until November 11 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Colville, Metaline, Worley, Plummer, Kettle Falls, Athol, Metaline Falls, Hayden, Newport, Post Falls, Priest River, Fruitland, Clark Fork, Republic, Bonners Ferry, Northport, Coeur d`Alene, Chewelah, Inchelium, Moscow, Genesee, Sherman Pass, Sandpoint, Wauconda, Potlatch, Tiger, Ione, Deer Park, and Eastport * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle
